data.why:
I have a handful of my own modules, packaged under AutoCode, and
    scripts to auto generate the perl source code and more magically
    perl objects in memory in air (which requires you, a developer, just
    define an 'object shema'). Another one is what i call AutoSQL. After
    you have a database schema, my code can generate both the SQL create
    table with specific RDBMS application, such as MySQL , Oracle, etc,
    and the DBAdaptor system.
